definition[0]: non-renewable types of energy such as coal or gas cannot be replaced after they have been used
example[0]: All countries are being asked to cut down on their use of non-renewable resources.
definition[1]: non-renewable types of energy such as coal or oil cannot be replaced once they have been used
example[1]: a tax on all forms of non-renewable energy
example[2]: These regulations will only encourage a massive waste of valuable andnon-renewable natural resources.
